name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. John L. BAKER, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
JONES, former C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. John L. BAKER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence is affirmed.
JONES, former C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: James J. Phelan, Jr., Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
373 A.2d 457
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. John L. BAKER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 11, 1977.
Decided June 3, 1977.
James J. Phelan, Jr., Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
